zone.line: When Freedom is riding to conquest by
Though the slaves that fan her
Be freedom famine & Toil giving sigh for sigh
And ye who attend her imperial car
Lift not your hands in the banded war
But in her defense whose children ye are
To those who have greatly suffered & don
Was greater than that which ye shall
Conquerors have conquered thei foes alone
Whose revenge pride & power thy have
Ride ye, victorious, over your own
With crownals of violet ivy & pine
